pr_title: Map Vote Enhancement: Announce the winning map

timeline.message:
Announce map poll winner

Signed-off-by: applenick <applenick@users.noreply.github.com>

timeline.bodyText:
I would just merge this method & the sendMessage method, wich is already done per-player, just rename sendMessage to announceMapWinner with the player & picked map as params, and integrate this logic there, it's only called when the map has actually ended.
You could also make it so the picked map name is underlined or bolded in the chat msg
timeline.author: Pablete1234

replies.bodyText:
Awesome,
I was initially unsure whether it would be more appropriate to make this separate, however I will merge this into the sendMessage method. Thanks!
I’ll also make the formatting changes suggested 👍
replies.author: applenick

timeline.message:
Adjust titles, remove setting, new map name styling

Signed-off-by: applenick <applenick@users.noreply.github.com>

timeline.bodyText: Why not just append a .underlined(winner) (or bold)?
timeline.author: Pablete1234

replies.bodyText: Originally I tried just modifying the map name using the method you suggested, however what I found was since the author list is included they are bolded/underlined as well. I feel that having just the map name highlighted is better visually. Also adjusting the color makes it more prominent too.
